text:
Agoda.com offers unbeatable deals on accommodation for its Thailand Flash Sale
Agoda.com, one of Asia’s leading hotel booking sites and part of Nasdaq-listed Priceline Group, is announcing a Thailand Flash Sale, allowing savvy travelers to find accommodation specials of up to 70% off in some of Thailand’s most popular destinations.
From 24 September to 1 October 2015, travelers can find great deals on accommodation in Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Pattaya, Phuket, and Ko Samui, all top destinations for visitors to the Land of Smiles. The stay period for this promotion is from 24 September 2015 to 30 April 2016.
Fans of sand, sun, and beach cocktails can head to Pattaya, Phuket, or Ko Samui, three of Thailand’s most popular ocean-front destinations. Each provide a unique twist on the traditional beach holiday – Pattaya’s nightlife draws those looking to blow of some steam, Phuket offers endless opportunities for snorkeling, diving, and island-hopping, while Ko Samui offers jungle hikes, waterfalls, and vistas that look out across the whole island in every direction.
Bangkok is the country’s steamy, boisterous capital, perfect for those who love to get lost in giant markets, tour temples, and enjoy some of the best food in Asia. No matter if you visit local street chefs or one of the many world-class dining establishments that have opened in recent years, you’ll never go hungry.
In Chiang Mai, visitors love the many opportunities for trekking in the heavily jungled hills and mountains, visiting remote hill tribe villages, and exploring the surrounding towns and temples. Unique local cuisine and a vibrant musical scene ensure that you’re never at a loss for things to do.
